title: Ballet in New Zealand
creator_credit: New Zealand National Film Unit, Geoffrey Scott, Cyril Morton and Robert Lapresle
brief_description: The standard of ballet in New Zealand is shown in excerpts from four works - ‘Napoli’, ‘Do-wack-a-do’, ‘Les Sylphides’, ‘Prismatic variations’. A good representative selection which shows competence, imagination and enthusiasm.
